item.title: [REL] Mycelium Armour
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

RuneScape Wiki

Mycelium web armour

Mycelium web armour is a low level magic armour requiring 5 Magic to wear. It can be bought from Polypore Dungeon Supplies in the Polypore Dungeon, run by the Merchant. Fungal flakes, Grifolic flakes or Ganodermic flakes can be added to the Mycelium...

Read full topic
